main event: An observer saw an unusual object in the sky while walking their dog on two occasions in December 1957.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing the same type of object on two different occasions,The object was described as rocket case shaped like a pencil and bright white like the moon,The sighting occurred at a 22-degree elevation and azimuth 65 west facing south shore of Long Island,The observer usually watches stars and had experience with similar sightings,The object exhibited rapid, constant track and descent at the horizon.
sighted object: an object resembling a comet or shooting star
witness description: an observer who was walking their dog and usually watches stars
